seo.title: invite friends and earn with us
seo.description: Invite friends using your referral link and earn $5 + 25% of their commissions for a whole year. Meanwhile, your friends will get a $5 gift for their first transaction. Cool, isn’t it?

wallet_main_heading.title: invite friends and earn with us
wallet_main_heading.description: Invite friends using your referral link and earn $5 + 25% of their commissions for a whole year. Meanwhile, your friends will get a $5 gift for their first transaction. Cool, isn’t it?

array.title: send invites
array.description: Send a $5 gift at our expense to your friends from a contact list or share your link around the web

array.title: receive a $5 gift
array.description: When your invited friend registers an account and makes one of crypto-to-fiat transactions from the list below for at least €50 you both receive your $5 bonuses in CRPT!

array.title: earn 25% on their comissions
array.description: You will receive 25% from your friend’s second and further transactions in CRPT for every new crypto-to-fiat operation (see the transactions that counts above)

banner.title:
more than
422,000 CRPT
banner.description: We have already given away more than 400k CRPT to our users for bringing new people to Choise.com. Keep your friends active and earn more!

faq_array.title: When will I get my rewards?
faq_array.description: You will get your reward after you and your invited friends successfully verify the identity and make a crypto-to-fiat transaction (buy, cashout, top up mobile phone or Crypterium Card) worth over €50.

faq_array.title: How many people can I invite?
faq_array.description: There is no limit on invited friends.
